game.name: Scission
game.genres: 액션, 인디, 무료 플레이, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능
game.shortDescription: Scission is a dark and gruesome action game where you control two characters at once. Fight grotesque representations of the subconscious, master new skills and explore the depth of the human mind in this singleplayer game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Scission is a dark and gruesome action game where you control two characters at once. Fight grotesque representations of the subconscious, master new skills and explore the depth of the human mind in this singleplayer game.
